title: Wout van Aert Exits in Ambulance after Crash Decimates Dwars door Vlaanderen
content:
Belgian star leaves pre-Tour of Flanders tune-up battered and torn after crash brings down Pedersen, Stuyven, and huge bunch of favorites.

Read the full article at Wout van Aert Exits in Ambulance after Crash Decimates Dwars door Vlaanderen on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
